page.title: 16 Pub Games in Northants.
page.content: Entertainment in the pubs is changing. Some of the traditional games such as skittles are disappearing from the pubs in the area.{Skittles} is played on a leather topped table which is about waist high with a net at the back to stop the skittles falling on the floor. The skittles,called Â£pins' are about 15 cms high & are arranged on the table in the shape of a diamond. The player stands about 1 & a half metres away & throws three wooden disks calledÂ£ cheeses' at the pins.A good player will knock down 27 pins with his three cheeses.It is a noisy game & is usually played in a games room or in a public bar.It is being replaced by the American game of{pool} in many public houses.
